definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
earnestly and sincerely (idiom); with all sincerity

sentences.english: The onus now is on the government of Pakistan to act with sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦政府現在有責任採取有誠意的行動。

sentences.english: He has a sincere desire to help you.
sentences.chinese: 他是誠心誠意地想幫助你。

sentences.english: Conscious Awareness of Innate Knowledge instead the Investigation of Things, he made a whole new interpretation of the phenomena of nature.
sentences.chinese: 他以致知代替誠意，對格物進行了全新的解釋。

sentences.english: I cannot accept your insincere apology.
sentences.chinese: 我無法接受你根本毫無誠意的道歉。

sentences.english: The third type does not have the sincerity of accepting criticism, only paying lip service.
sentences.chinese: 第三種人沒有采納批評的誠意，只是巧言令色。

sentences.english: His absence spoke his lack of sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 他不肯來證明了他缺乏誠意。

sentences.english: Even the most basic is not to make friends, talk about what?
sentences.chinese: 連最基本的誠意都沒有，又談何做朋友？

sentences.english: They all have in common, however, sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 不過，他們共同擁有的就是真心誠意。

sentences.english: Her apology fostered even greater argument, with many questioning her sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 她的道歉引起了更大的爭論，很多人質問她的誠意。

sentences.english: I honestly believe Christian Purslow has been open and honest with us.
sentences.chinese: 我當然相信帕斯洛這次所表達出來的誠意。

sentences.english: Through the ages, people stress sincerity, praise highly sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 千百年來，人們強調誠意，稱歎的誠意。

sentences.english: Through the ages, people stress sincerity, praise highly sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 千百年來，人們強調誠意，稱歎的誠意。

sentences.english: Additionally room of a car rents, can make goods warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個車房誠意出租，可作堆棧。

sentences.english: Your sincerity will help to make people feel appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 你的誠意將有助於人們感到被賞識。

sentences.english: He said he was sorry, but I know he didn't mean it.
sentences.chinese: 他說他很抱歉，但我知道他毫無誠意。

sentences.english: He says the timing of the declaration is not as important as the sincerity of its contents.
sentences.chinese: 他說，公佈清單的時間並不像有誠意的內容那樣重要。

definition: to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
